title: 10 sales and business development jobs: WeShopMY, Evaysion, FoodRazor and more
text:
Looking for sales and business development opportunities? We have handpicked 10 jobs for you this week. Click on the links below and apply away!
Recruiting and keen to list your jobs in future articles? Click here to create your company profile and post jobs. We feature jobs based on the following criteria:
Activity of recruiters on the platform. Recruiters who actively post new jobs, remove old ones, and accept/reject applicants will have higher chances of being featured. Completeness of company profile and job details. Company with incomplete profile or poor job description will not be featured. Sales and Customer Support at WeshopMY 
Work location: Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia/Full-time Requirement: At least 1 year experience in customer service, call center or telesales, demonstrated ability to consistently close and generate revenues, excellent communication & interpersonal skill. Skills: Sales, customer service, communication skills. Salary Range: MYR 2,000 – 2,800 More jobs at WeshopMY 
Co Founder, Business Development at MedEXO Robotics 
Work location: Hong Kong/ Full-time Requirement: Cantonese and English fluent, excellent organizational skills, prior experience in medical technology product is highly desired, strong analytical skills and data-driven thinking. Skills: Cantonese language, business management, English language More jobs at MedEXO Robotics 
Sales & Marketing Coordinator at Evaysion 
Work location: Hong Kong/Full-time Requirement: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, understanding of marketing and negotiating techniques, self-motivated with a results-driven approach. Skills: Business development, English language, sales & marketing. More jobs at Evaysion 
Business Development Specialist at FoodRazor 
Work location: Singapore/ Full-time Requirement: Prior experience in B2B sales or business development, strong presentation and communication skills, possess highly motivated and results driven personality. Skills: Business development & partnerships, sales, communication skills. Salary Range: SGD 2,500 – 3,500 More jobs at FoodRazor 
Sales Manager at emc group 
Work location: Bangkok, Thailand/Full-time Requirement: Leader and great communicator who understand digital marketing, excellent analytical skills and entrepreneurial attitude, social character who fluent in English. Skills: Sales strategy & management, sales training, sales & marketing. Salary Range: THB 35,000 – 80,000 More jobs at emc group 
Asst. Key Account Manager at Quandoo 
Work location: Singapore/ Internship Requirement: Must be a Singaporean, have hands on mentality and always put the customer first, able to communicate effectively at all levels, already have experience in a startup setting. Skills: Business development & partnerships, sales, business development. Salary Range: SGD 3,000 – 4,000 More jobs at Quandoo 
Business Development Intern at DropIt.my 
Work location: Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia/Internship Requirement: Well spoken in English, exceptional analytical skills and a strong attention to detail, experience in setting up businesses, willing to intern at least three months. Skills: Sales, business development, analytical skills. Salary Range: IDR 5,000,000 – 12,000,000 More jobs at DropIt.my 
B2B Sales Specialist at Gorry Gourmet 
Work location: Jakarta, Indonesia/Full-time Requirement: 1-2 years previous experience in account management, strong relationship building skills, experience of managing major national accounts, excellent level of accuracy and detail-orientation. Skills: Business development & partnerships, sales, strategic partnerships. Salary Range: IDR 5,000,000 – 10,000,000 More jobs at Gorry Gourmet 
Junior Relationship Manager at Investree 
Work location: Jakarta, Indonesia/ Full-time Requirement: Minimum 2 years of working experience in Banking or other financial industry is preferred, good analytical skill especially to explore new potential business, excellent sales skills. Skills: Business development & partnerships, sales. More jobs at Investree 
Business Development & Sales at SourceSage 
Work location: Mumbai, India/Full-time Requirement: Good communication and presentation skills, comfortable to cold-call, knowing local dialects and language in India is a must, previous enterprise software sales experience is a plus. Skills: Customer acquisition, business development, sales & marketing. Salary Range: INR 45,000 – 55,000 Equity: Yes More jobs at SourceSage
